contentprovisioning-ui-overview-grid-sec: Label for the 'Page' column in the ContentProvisioning overview grid.
Label for the 'In sync?' column in the ContentProvisioning overview grid; indicates if the local page matches the remote manifest.
contentprovisioning-ui-overview-grid-act: Tooltip and action label for the button that forces synchronization of the wiki page with the manifest.
Tooltip and action label for the button that shows the difference between the wiki page content and the provisioner content.
contentprovisioning-diff-no-change: Message displayed when there are no differences between the wiki page and the provisioner content.
contentprovisioning-ui-content-diff-titl: Title of the dialog displaying content differences between wiki and provisioner.
contentprovisioning-ui-content-diff-head: Label used above the section showing the wiki page content in the content difference dialog.
Label used above the section showing the provisioner (remote) content in the content difference dialog.
